English.Char_Desc_80: JavaScript Plus! - Advanced JavaScript editor for windows.
English.Char_Desc_250: JavaScript Plus! is an advanced JavaScript editor for windows. Modern, clean and convenient interface, quick startup, true flexibility and powerful features allow you to create and edit JavaScript.
English.Char_Desc_450: JavaScript Plus! is an advanced javascript editor for windows. Modern, clean and convenient interface, quick startup, true flexibility and powerful features allow you to create and edit JavaScript.
English.Char_Desc_2000: JavaScript Plus! is an advanced javascript editor for windows. Modern, clean and convenient interface, quick startup, true flexibility and powerful features allow you to create and edit JavaScript.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions:
Javascript Plus! Editor v6.1 01/28/2008 ================================== Copyright © 2002-2008 VBSoftware Homepage: http://www.vbsoftware.cl/ E-mail : support@vbsoftware.cl
What is Javascript Plus! ---------------------------- Javascript Plus! is an advanced Javascript editor for windows. Modern, clean and convenient interface, quick startup, true flexibility and powerful features allow you to create and edit Javascript.
Main Features ----------------- - Clean & powerfull interface. A modern interface like Visual Studio .NET develoment environment. - Javascript Intellisense. Get instant information for javascript objects, methods , properties and user functions. - HTML Intellisense. Get instant information for html tags , attributes & events. - Explore functions using the function explorer. - Explore your html documents using the Html explorer. View images, hiperlinks, scripts & sheets style reference. - Analize and Search for Errors using the code analizer. - Includes Tidy. (Powerful html validator). Using tidy you can clean html, convert to XHTML, convert to xml, indent html tags, validate & fix html, validate html. - Integrated Object Browser. Explore all javascript objects, method and properties. - Expand the environment using plugins. Build your own plugin using activex dll. Javascript Plus! includes a Visual Basic 6.0 sample project ready to use. - Preview your file in browser. Javascript Plus! supports Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, Netscape & Opera. - Includes 18 Built in Wizards (Add to Favorites, Calendar, Countries Menu, Coloured Scrollbar, Drop Down Menu, Email Link, IFrame Wizard, Image Rollover, Last Modified Date, Left Menu, Meta Tag, MouseOver Text Links, Popup Window, Page Transition, Tree Menus, SlideShow, Tabbed Menu, Popup Menu) - Macro supports.
SHAREWARE --------------- Javascript Plus! is not free software. You may use this software for evaluation purposes without charge for 20 uses. If you use this software after the 20 use, you must pay registration fee. See 'How to register' on the Online Manual.
Distribution ------------- You may distribute the evaluation version of this software and documentation in its unmodified form via electronic means. But you should not charge or requesting donations for any such copies however made and from distributing the software and/or documentation with other products without the author's written permission.
System Requirement ------------------------ * Windows 98/Me/NT4/2000/XP. * IE 6 or higher for browser feature (optional).
Installation ------------- IMPORTANT!!! - remove older Javascript Plus! version first.
- Execute setup.exe.
Remove ---------- Run 'Uninstall' on the Javascript Plus! Start Menu folder or open 'Add/Remove Programs' in Control Panel and double-click 'Javascript Plus! 6.1' in the list box.
Feedback ----------- For feedback, questions and any comments: - E-mail support@vbsoftware.cl - sales sales@vbsoftware.cl - contact contact@vbsoftware.cl - Homepage http://www.vbsoftware.cl/
